WRITING.TITLE: Write down your 5 favorite songs. Others can recommend more songs based on the choices.
WRITING.TEXT:
I'm pretty new to Kpop (3 months) so I think this will help me find more good tracks and groups.
My choices:
5. BTS - Blood Sweat and Tears 4. TVXQ - Catch Me 3. EXO - Call Me Baby 2. EXO - Monster 1. Jay Park - Me Like Yuh
Honorable mentions are Blackpink - Playing with fire and Boombayah, BTS - Fire, Got7 - Just Right and Shinee - Everybody
Edit: Also really like EXO - Dancing King. Yoo Jae Suk is the best.

WRITING.TITLE: What are some good tutorials (on anything) to watch?
For people who have visited public bath houses, has there been any weird experiences?
Which anime was surprisingly good and/or surprisingly bad?
WRITING.TEXT:
SG - Haikyuu. I like sport irl but I never considered watching a sport anime before Haikyuu. I checked it out and after a few episodes it quickly became my favorite show.
SB - Sword Art Online. This was the first anime I ever watched. I had been recommended by many to watch it and had seen some Youtube clips that looked intriguing. Holy crap. This show was so bad. It literally put me off anime for ages because I thought this was the best that anime had to offer.
Edit: Not trying to offend anyone who likes SAO by the way. Just my opinion.
